subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Eastern Paranormal/In my house I AM IN YOUR HOUSE.mp3 
  Uploaded by : eastern_paranormal <eparanormal@...> 
  Description : Q. Are you in my house? A. I am in your house. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Eastern%20Paranormal/In%20my%20house%20I%20AM%20IN%20YOUR%20HOUSE.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

eastern_paranormal <eparanormal@...>
